divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife was in Mexico City at the Teotihuacan pyramids at 11:25 and was just taking random pics of the pyramids, this was on November 9, 2007. She realized nothing at the time, only noticed when uploaded pics to computer (pics 15 & 20). On November 11, my wife was walking through Tequisquiapan at 16:45 and was taking pictures of the monolith. At the time she was taking the pictures she didn't see anything unusual and again only noticed when uploaded pics to computer(pic 100). I believe these objects are the all the same object even though it was two different days. I was just wondering if you had any idea on what you think they might be. I find picture # 100 is the best for clarity. There all hard to see and must be zoomed in, but once there zoomed in there quite clear. The reason i first noticed is because on picture # 100 theres a black circle and above the spot i saw a bright blue spec, this one is the only picture with the black circle. If you find these pictures of interest i have more of the same object. Thank you
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Mexico City
There were no other sightings in Mexico City on or around November 9th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
